The Day I Saw Your Heart Jennifer Devoldère 2011 Categories: Art, Comedy, Drama, Family Relationships, Fiction, Romance, Women, Young Adults Average Rating: My Rating: 1 2 3 4 5 Run time: 105 min. | aka: Et soudain, tout le monde me manque | France | Language: French with subtitles | Film Format: 35mm Note: Trailer is in French without subtitles.

This lighthearted comedy offers poignant reflections on family life. Eli Dhrey’s news that his third wife is pregnant unsettles his grown daughters. Dom, trying to adopt, is indignant. Justine, her unmoored twentysomething half sister, responds by making stunning X-ray art from images acquired during her day job. Enjoy delightful performances by Michel Blanc (The Girl on the Train, 2009 Festival) as Eli and Mélanie Laurent (La Rafle, Le Concert, Inglorious Basterds) as Justine.
